hero.description: Experience the authentic taste of Adriatic cuisine in the heart of Durrës

about.title: Our Story
about.subtitle: From Humble Beginnings
about.description1: Restaurant Titanic opened its doors in 2010 with a simple idea: to bring the freshest seafood from the Adriatic Sea directly to your plate. Located in the historic district of Durrës, our restaurant has become a favorite among locals and tourists alike.
about.description2: Our chefs prepare each dish with passion and precision, combining traditional Albanian recipes with modern culinary techniques to create unforgettable dining experiences.

menu.title: Our Menu
menu.priceNotice: All prices are in Albanian Lek (ALL). Menu items and prices may change seasonally to ensure we serve only the freshest ingredients.
